javax.servlet.sip.annotation

Annotation Type SipApplication


  • @Target(value={PACKAGE,TYPE})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface SipApplication
    The @SipApplication annotation is used to create an application level annotation for a collection of SipServlets
    Since:
    1.1

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      ConcurrencyMode concurrencyMode 
      String description 
      boolean disableCancelHandling 
      String displayName 
      boolean distributable 
      boolean enableDerivedSessionAttributeCloning
      Enable cloning of attributes when derived session is created.
      boolean establishDialogOnSubscribeTransaction 
      String largeIcon 
      SipLogin loginConfig 
      String mainServlet 
      String name 
      int proxyTimeout 
      int sessionTimeout 
      String smallIcon 
      String version
      Version of the SIP application.

      • version

        public abstract String version
        Version of the SIP application. It can be either 1.1 or 2.0 The sip container will fail the deployment for any other value.
        Since:
        2.0
        Default:
        "2.0"
